rooms.description: This space is designed to seamlessly integrate with the foyer and main living area, providing a welcoming transition into the home.

A combined open-plan space that serves as both living and dining area. The kitchen is integrated with modern eco-friendly appliances and ample storage solutions, designed to foster family interaction and social gatherings. Natural lighting and ventilation are prioritized.

This dedicated library provides a quiet retreat for reading and study. Incorporates shelves, comfortable seating, and ambient lighting, with natural light from an adjacent window placed per Vastu guidelines for knowledge and creativity.

A dedicated workspace designed to be productive and conducive to concentration. Features include built-in storage, ergonomic furniture setup, and a separate entrance from the living area as recommended by modern remote work trends.

openings.description: Main entry door designed for easy access, complemented with natural light and ventilation.
Enhances connection between indoor and outdoor spaces while ensuring energy efficiency.
Provides additional natural light to the open-plan living space.
